Uses of Interface
fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee.PreferenceFunction

  • Packages that use PreferenceFunction 
    Package Description
    fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee  

    • Uses of PreferenceFunction in fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee

      Classes in fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee that implement PreferenceFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Type1PreferenceFunction
      Type 1 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a simple function giving 0 for negative (or zero) deviations and 1 for positive deviations.
      class  Type2PreferenceFunction
      Type 2 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a simple function giving 0 for deviations below or equal to a parameter q and 1 for deviations over parameter q.
      class  Type3PreferenceFunction
      Type 3 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a function giving 0 for negative (or zero) deviations, linear from 0 to 1 for positive but below parameter p deviations, and giving 1 for deviations over parameter p.
      class  Type4PreferenceFunction
      Type 4 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a stair-shaped function giving 0 for deviations below a parameter q, 0.5 for deviations between parameter q and parameter p (p>q) and 1 for deviations over p.
      class  Type5PreferenceFunction
      Type 5 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a function giving 0 for deviations below parameter q, linear between parameter q and parameter p (p>q), and 1 for deviations over p.
      class  Type6PreferenceFunction
      Type 6 preference function from Brans & Mareschal 2005, it's a gaussian criterion, with a function giving 0 for negative (or zero) deviations and tends to 1 when deviation tends to infinity, a parameter s giving the inflexion point of the curve.
      Methods in fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee that return PreferenceFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PreferenceFunction PrometheeCriterion.getPreferenceFunction() 
      Methods in fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee with parameters of type PreferenceFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PrometheeCriterion.setPreferenceFunction(PreferenceFunction preferenceFunction) 
      Constructors in fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.util.multicriteriadecision.promethee with parameters of type PreferenceFunction 
      Constructor and Description
      PrometheeCriterion(String name, PreferenceFunction preferenceFunction)
